Posts.Content: countrymama wrote: I will be having surgery Tuesday to have a lump removed from my left breast, by my axilla, and was wondering if anyone has had this done, and wanted to know what to expect after surgery is over.  I am worried to death about this because they do not know what it is and has diagonsed it as a palpable left breast mass, can anyone explain this to me a little better?? Thank you all! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: getting lump removed countrymama flower123
